HomePage.title: Sopreden Trading
HomePage.subtitle: A World of Quality in Every Seed

Hero.title: A World of Quality in Every Seed
Hero.subtitle: Discover our premium selection of sunflower and pumpkin seeds, tailored for your needs.

Products.title: Our Products
Products.subtitle: Explore our wide range of high-quality seeds and oils.

pumpkin-seeds.title: Pumpkin Seeds
pumpkin-seeds.description: We mainly work with 'Lady nails'. Pumpkin seeds are widely used for culinary purposes mainly due to the wide number of health benefits they provide.

sunflower-chips.title: Sunflower Chips
sunflower-chips.description: This is the broken fraction which is a derivative of the dehulling process and is mainly used for birdfeed.

stripped-sunflower.title: Stripped Sunflower
stripped-sunflower.description: We can offer a variety of stripped sunflower from those for birdfeed (Pioneer or badger) to those for the snack industry and baking (Jumbo, XXL).

sunflower-kernels.title: Sunflower Kernels
sunflower-kernels.description: Bakery-grade sunflower kernels for baking and animal feed, as well as superior and confectionery grade varieties.

palm-oil.title: Palm Oil
palm-oil.description: Responsible selection of palm oil products for the food industry (milk, sweets, popcorn, nuts) and bio-diesel production.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: Specialized solutions for your business needs.

specialized-sunflower.title: Specialized Sunflower Products
specialized-sunflower.description: Designed to fulfill your exact needs. From bakery-grade sunflower kernels for baking and animal feed to superior and confectionery grade varieties.

palm-oil-solutions.title: Versatile Palm Oil Solutions
palm-oil-solutions.description: Responsible selection of palm oil products for the food industry (milk, sweets, popcorn, nuts) and bio-diesel production.

premium-seed.title: Premium Seed Selection
premium-seed.description: Outstanding selection of 'Lady Nail' pumpkin seeds, carefully picked and treated for unbeatably high quality.

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Learn more about Sopreden Trading.
About.content: Sopreden Trading is a leading provider of high-quality seeds and oils. We are committed to sustainability and quality in every product we offer. Our dedication to excellence ensures that our customers receive only the best sunflower and pumpkin seeds, as well as responsible palm oil solutions.

News.title: Latest News
News.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest from Sopreden.

benefits-seeds.title: Discover the Benefits of Sopreden’s Premium Seed Selection
benefits-seeds.content: In the world of agriculture and food production, the quality of seeds plays a pivotal role. Sopreden, a name synonymous with excellence, offers a premium seed selection that stands out for its superior quality and numerous benefits. In this article, we delve into the advantages of choosing Sopreden’s premium seeds and why they are the preferred choice for discerning customers.

sustainability-palm-oil.title: Sopreden’s Commitment to Sustainability: A Look into Our Palm Oil Production
sustainability-palm-oil.content: In an era where sustainability is not just a buzzword but a necessity, Sopreden is proud to highlight its unwavering commitment to responsible and sustainable practices, particularly in our palm oil production. As a leading provider of high-quality agricultural products, including palm oil, we understand the importance of balancing economic growth with environmental stewardship and social responsibility.

sunflower-kernel-bakery.title: Sopreden’s Sunflower Kernel Bakery Grade: A New Favorite in the Baking Industry
sunflower-kernel-bakery.content: The baking industry is constantly evolving, with bakers and food manufacturers always on the lookout for high-quality ingredients that can elevate their products. Sopreden, a trusted name in agricultural products, has recently introduced its Sunflower Kernel Bakery Grade, which is quickly becoming a new favorite in the baking world.

sunflower-crude-oil.title: Sopreden Introduces Sunflower Crude Oil to Its Product Line
sunflower-crude-oil.content: Exciting news from the world of agribusiness! Sopreden, a leading provider of premium sunflower products, palm oil, and pumpkin seeds, has recently announced a significant expansion of its product lineup. The latest addition? Sunflower Crude Oil – a versatile, high-quality product that promises to deliver in…
